â€œTastes sweet and fruity as green vapor moving to nutty brown hits, responds well to decarb'ing, and makes excellent canna-butter. 
Effect is relaxing and calming to GI spasticity, providing good relief for chronic nausea and vomiting caused by celiac and autoimmune disease.â€

â€œVery tasty, I  like the Blackberry taste. 
Wonderful buzz, I got a lot done.â€

â€œBlackberry Rhino is quite a good strain to choose for pain relief.  It's a nice, potent Indica whose effects are euphoric and surreal, and easily taps into the imagination.   The high is heavily oriented in the body, causing a comforting, warm sort of relief.  Its flavor is very sweet, with a slightly sour, fruity taste, with a smell a bit reminiscent to strains like Fruity Pebbles.â€

â€œwow, cough cough, this is one of the tastiest indicas I have smoked yet.  in fact this strain is so unique with its terpenes you can identify its smell, even if the guy up the block is smoking it.â€

â€œDelicious berry flavor, frosty green and purple nugs, and one of the smoothest smokes I've ever had! No coughing, just pure enjoyment. This stuff kicks in quick and is quite uplifting for an Indica! Definitely worth a try!!bâ€

â€œI really enjoyed this strain. I suffer from chronic pain associated with MS and Insomnia and this took care of both!!! I would definitely recommend this strain to anyone who is looking for something to knock out your pain.â€

â€œLovely, relaxing strain. Perfect for getting home from work late because all the soreness just evaporates and it clears your head. Not a favorite, but definitely up there. Helps with my chronic nausea/vomiting, too.â€
â€œhigh lasts longer, great for catching up with your rest or calming down after a long days of work.â€

â€œI thought it would be better. it was good. however taste and short effect we're an issue. It was a premium priced strain and I expected allot. Buzz was fairly intent but short lived. Taste was harsher with less Berry and more rhino...good sleep aid.â€
â€œI thought it would put me to sleep but instead it gave me tons of energy. I was acting pretty wacky, honestly.â€
